channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump administration plans to cut 80,000 employees from Veterans Affairs, according to internal memo
item.description: The Department of Veterans Affairs is planning an “aggressive” reorganization that includes cutting 80,000 jobs from the sprawling agency that provides health care for retired military members.

item.title: Powerful US storms create blizzard conditions and threaten to spawn more tornadoes
Los Angeles County sues Southern California Edison, alleging utility’s equipment sparked wildfire
